title: Hook Configurations
form_trigger_tip: Pre-transfer hooks run before files are copied; post-transfer hooks run after the copy completes.
builtin_trigger_mismatch: Warning: this hook is designed for {{expected}} only.
form_script_path_tip: Absolute path to the Python script inside the API container (e.g. /hooks/my_hook.py)
form_instrument_tip: Restrict this hook to a specific instrument. Leave blank to apply it globally to all instruments.
form_priority_tip: Lower numbers run first. Hooks with the same priority run in creation order.
